EmailTemplate.name: 6_1_Cold_Nurture_Client.6_1_Cold_Nurture_Client_Email_5
EmailTemplate.subject: Would you like to take a closer look at Turbonomic 6.1?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/introducing-turbonomic-6-1/6-1-highlight-reel]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
To be successful, the future of the data center and cloud must be powered by automation.
Whether you're leveraging on-premises, hybrid, or purely cloud, our latest product release can help. Turbonomic 6.1 enables SMART (Self-Managing, Anywhere, in Real-Time) Workloads to continuously and most effectively choose the right infrastructure resources to meet the real-time and fluctuating demand requirements for any applications.
Would you like to take a closer look at the latest release? Check out our Turbonomic 6.1 highlight reel <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/introducing-turbonomic-6-1/6-1-highlight-reel]]> or reach out to your Customer Success Manager to learn more!
Regards, Team Turbonomic
